attributes.action: give the bbc LOTS more money from central govt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BSkyB is making freeview pay per view. If we lose the BBC , the only thing we will have to watch is global edited sky tv. 

Rupert murdoch will make more money and the usa , uk and Oz will be even more politically aligned. 

Give the BBC more money to invest in freeview and let ANY tv company easily create tv channels. Let the BBC and others create a next gen High Def service for all UK without having to pay monthly line rental or pay per view. FREE!
